slides.title: Video Analytics Solution Proposal for Cedo Vietnam

content.text: Project: AI-Powered Video Analytics for Safety Monitoring and Compliance
Project Owner: Cedo Vietnam

Work Scope: Cloud-based AI system to monitor workplace safety in real-time, transforming existing CCTV infrastructure into a proactive safety monitoring solution. The system will detect PPE compliance and unsafe behaviors to prevent safety incidents.
Project Duration: Q1/2026 (Site survey scheduled for 1st week of January 2026)
Camera Number: 17 cameras - Workshop VN1: 9 cameras (Verkada CD41 and CD41-E) - Workshop VN2: 8 cameras (Verkada CD41 and CD41-E)
Number of AI Module per Camera: 2-3 modules per camera (average)

AI Modules: 1. Helmet Detection
2. Hi-vis vest detection
3. Safety shoes detection
4. Safety Gloves Detection
5. Anti Collision

left_column.title: viAct Responsibilities
content: Software: AI video analytics license, maintenance, and support
Camera integration: Integration with existing Verkada cameras via RTSP
Cloud infrastructure: Cloud-based deployment and management
System configuration: AI module configuration and calibration

right_column.title: Client Responsibilities
content: Hardware: Existing camera infrastructure (Verkada CD41 and CD41-E cameras)
Network: Stable internet connection with minimum 12 Mbps per camera, port 554 access
Power: Stable power source for cameras and network equipment
Speaker integration: Integration of existing on-site speakers (3 speakers per workshop) with the AI system
Site access: Provide access for site survey and system deployment

content.text: Per-camera bandwidth: 12 Mbps
Total system bandwidth: 204 Mbps (12 Mbps × 17 cameras)
Port requirement: Port 554 for RTSP access
Network stability: Stable internet connection required
Resolution: 1080p
Frame rate: 25fps (standard)
Connectivity Type: IP-based cameras with RTSP support
Camera models: Verkada CD41 and CD41-E
Camera count: 17 cameras (9 at VN1, 8 at VN2)
Speaker integration: 3 speakers per workshop (6 speakers total) - integration feasibility to be confirmed during site survey
Power Source: Stable power source (confirmed available)

content.purpose: Ensures compliance with safety regulations by identifying workers wearing safety helmets. Detects workers without a safety helmet in the manufacturing facility.
content.alert_logic: AI will capture people not wearing a helmet or wearing the helmet incorrectly, and trigger real-time alerts.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects workers wearing high-visibility vests. These vests enhance visibility, especially in low-light conditions, ensuring worker safety in manufacturing areas.
content.alert_logic: Alert will be sent out immediately to remind workers missing a reflective vest. AI identifies missing vests and notifies in real time.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects the presence of different safety gloves required at various working zones to ensure workers meet safety gear regulation, especially for cutting and welding activities.
content.alert_logic: AI will capture people not wearing safety gloves and trigger real-time alerts.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects workers without safety shoes before entering the site and/or during working at the site. Verifies proper footwear usage. Safety shoes protect against hazards like falling objects or sharp materials.
content.alert_logic: Alert will be sent out immediately to site supervisors when workers without safety shoes are detected.
content.preconditions: Camera must maintain a suitable distance for clear observation of workers, typically between 5 to 10 meters.

content.purpose: Detects and identifies potential or actual workers dangerously close to moving machinery within 100 cm (3 feet). Prevents unsafe human-machine proximity incidents, including human intervention such as putting hands or climbing on machines during operation.
content.alert_logic: Automatically triggers an alert when a worker is detected within 100cm of moving machinery or when unsafe human-machine interaction is detected.
content.preconditions: Requires providing images of different machine types for model training. Camera must maintain clear view of machinery and surrounding work areas.
content.data_requirements: Request: Provide images of different machine types for model training

content.text: Channels:
Local speaker alerts: On-site speakers (3 speakers per workshop) for real-time audio alerts
Dashboard pop-ups: Real-time alerts displayed on web dashboard
Email notifications: Automated email alerts to supervisors and HSE team
Alert Integration: Integration with existing on-site speakers (3 speakers per workshop) - integration feasibility to be confirmed during site survey
Event Analysis: Charts and graphs showing detection frequencies for each module, safety compliance rates, and incident trends.
Alert Timelines: Chronological view of all safety incidents and alerts, with filtering by module type, location, and time period.
Evidence Snapshots: Image and video clips of detected events, including timestamp and location information.
Custom KPIs: Standard KPIs include:
PPE compliance rate (helmet, vest, shoes, gloves)
Unsafe behavior incidents (human-machine proximity violations)
Alert frequency by module and location
Safety trend analysis
Multi-Dashboard: Web-based dashboard accessible from multiple locations, with role-based access control.
Automated Reporting Features:
Daily summary reports sent to stakeholders (HSE Manager, Plant Director)
Weekly compliance reports with trend analysis
Export functionality: Excel / PDF / CSV formats
Filtering options: Timestamp, location (VN1/VN2), event type, module type
Report Content:
Total alerts by module type
Compliance rates by location
Incident trends and patterns
Evidence snapshots and video clips
